A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So on top of the weak plot\, disrespect to the saga as a whole\, and putrid treatment of beloved characters such as Finn\, Poe\, Rey\, Leia\, and Luke (especially Luke)\, Rian Johnson has proven that he's childish and unprofessional and will do anything to discredit valid criticism and mock devoted fans. \n\nGiving this movie 1 star is being generous. The cast deserved better. Fans deserved better.
